headline: Jim Cramer on Micron: “I Think You Buy a Little Bit Here”
summary: Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer shared his views on. A caller asked if it is a good time to get into the stock, and in response, Cramer said: “Okay, the problem with Micron is it’s got two businesses. headline: Finding Homes For All Those Zettabytes
summary: As data usage continues to explode, the digital storage industry is racing to innovate.
